title: COMMUNICABLE DISEASE CONTROL
content:
COMMUNICABLE DISEASE CONTROL
State Regulations
§ 40-2.20 - Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs) and Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV); performance standards
§ 40-2.21 - Tuberculosis; performance standards
§ 40-2.22 - Communicable disease control; performance standards
§ 40-2.23 - Immunization; performance standards
§ 40-2.24 - Zika Action Plan; performance standards (Repealed)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
